  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AirportDisplayBoardActivity
    This Activity is used to manage the display of airport and flight information.
    AirportFragment
    Fragment for displaying information related to airports.
    BearGeneratorActivity
    This class represents the main activity for the Bear Image Generator app.
    BearGeneratorFragment
    A fragment to display details about a specific bear image and provide an option to save it to the gallery.
    BearGeneratorGallery
    This activity displays a gallery of saved bear images from the app's internal storage.
    CurrencyActivity
    This is our Main Activity for the Currency App.
    CurrencyResult
    Our CurrencyResult class.
    CurrencyResultsFragement
    This is our fragement class.
    FlightFragment
    Fragment used to display details of a specific flight.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity class represents the main entry point of the application.
    TriviaActivity
    This class facilitates the playing of a trivia using OpenTDB's API.
    TriviaActivity.Answer
    This class associates an answer with the viewType it was assigned to.
    TriviaScoreDetailFragment
    This class displays details about a selected player score.
    TriviaScoreFragment
    This class hosts the player scores associated with the last-played trivia's category and difficulty.
    TriviaScoreFragment.Score
    This class stores the score of the user in a trivia game, and allows it to be added to a database.
    TriviaSelectorFragment
    This class allows the selection of a category and a difficulty for an OpenTDB trivia.
